name: Health Manager
description:
Health Manager have been made for the 128 Mini Jam

Limitation is The only way to go is up

Description

The year 2143 was just the beginning of the plague. Thanks to the latest technology, the Astrid corporation has created a medicines that is able to stop the disease for a while. You have been hired as a manager. Your responsibilities include deciding on the production and distribution of medicine to infected cities. If you work well you will climb the corporate ladder.

Human lives depend on your decisions.

Credits

Graphics and development: Mrdartmoor

Testing: Julia

Music: 'Track name' by Of Far Different Nature (https://fardifferent.bandcamp.com/)

Sounds: come from freesound.org

Color palette: come from lospec.com/

Thanks for playing.

Write your score in the comments down below.
